snippet.title: Mario Clash: Nintendo Virtual Boy (1995) - 3D Anaglyph
snippet.description:
Gameplay for Mario Clash (マリオクラッシュ Mario Kurasshu), a stereoscopic game released for the Nintendo Virtual Boy in 1995. 

It was recorded in Anaglyph 3D (red/cyan) as this is the most cost effective way to watch 3D.

Enjoy the video? Remember to like, comment and subscribe to Retro Gaming TV - http://bit.ly/2N5gjMA
